include » osgART

VideoBillboard File Reference

Detailed Description

Defined an OpenSceneGraph geode for creating a VideoBillboard Object. support a billboard object with dynamic texture. By default the object has a size of 1x1 in the XY plane.

Author:
Julian Looser Julian.Looser@hitlabnz.org

Raphael Grasset Raphael.Grasset@hitlabnz.org

Version:
3.1

#include <osg/Node>
#include <osg/Group>
#include <osg/MatrixTransform>
#include <osg/Geometry>
#include <osg/Projection>
#include <osgART/Export>
#include "osgART/GenericVideoObject"
#include "osgART/VideoPlane"
